channel.title: VPSLAND errors!
channel.description:
I am using Vpsland for my VPS.
My server is running with 30 people on but i cant login on the vps. If i full in the Ip i cant go to the login screen. And i also cant login on my new vps... Can other people login on there vps from vpsland.com?
Also, I cant connect to there live support and my emails stay un-awnsers. I also had a downtime to 99% uptime on moparscape status checker becaus of vpsland..
DONT TAKE VPSLAND.COM
YouriDudock

item.title: VPSLAND errors!
item.dc:creator: @youridudock youridudock
item.description:
@youridudock wrote:

That may be a lot for what you get but I have 7 of them at that price and I have never had a second of downtime and the customer care is amazing. They responded and fixed my problems in like 5 mins. (God i sound like an advertiser)

I use there service for a 2-3 years now and i always had problems Already 2 days for a response from the Billing Support. And 5 Days now for the fix becaus i cant login on my Vps. (I even send 2 emails!)

Read full topic

item.title: VPSLAND errors!
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[quote=“youridudock, post:5, topic:395997”][quote author=Andrew Ferguson link=topic=493176.msg3605713#msg3605713 date=1306091259]

Vpsland isn’t “bad” in a sense, it is just horribly under staffed, try kickassvps.com

Yh, I am going to use that after i got my re-fund from my vpsland vps lol.

They own me 54$ for 3 vps. One i never recieved becaus of a cancel? lol

They auto cancel when they can’t handle anymore vps’s im guessing some guy runs it in his basement lol.
[/quote]

xD read my Edit.[/quote]
That may be a lot for what you get but I have 7 of them at that price and I have never had a second of downtime and the customer care is amazing. They responded and fixed my problems in like 5 mins. (God i sound like an advertiser)

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:6, topic:395997”][quote author=Andrew Ferguson link=topic=493176.msg3605713#msg3605713 date=1306091259]

Vpsland isn’t “bad” in a sense, it is just horribly under staffed, try kickassvps.com

Yh, I am going to use that after i got my re-fund from my vpsland vps lol.

They own me 54$ for 3 vps. One i never recieved becaus of a cancel? lol

They auto cancel when they can’t handle anymore vps’s im guessing some guy runs it in his basement lol.
[/quote]L0L hence the under staff? xD[/quote]
Yep lolol xD

Read full topic
